name: MeitY pipeline for Speech-to-speech using AI4Bharat models
description: Task-pipelining for AI services hosted on MeitY's Dhruva instance using all models trained by AI4Bharat.

serviceProvider.name: MeitY
serviceProvider.aboutMe: The Ministry of Electronics and Information TechnologY, via the Bhashini initiative, is making available a platform called Dhruva where any open-source models can be deployed and scaled for production.

name: AI4Bharat Dhruva Speech-to-speech pipeline

serviceProvider.aboutMe: AI4Bhrat is a research center at IIT-Madras, working on Artificial Intelligence for languages of Bhrat.
